description.compact: Tag contains no content.

description.compact: Sets the current form element value. Cannot change the value of a hidden field.
Starts with a named tag with attributes only.
Accessor for name submitted as the key in GET/POST variables hash.

description.compact: Accessor for default value parsed with the tag.

Sets the current form element value.
Resets the form element value back to the default.

docblock.description: @access public

description.compact: Starts with a named tag with attributes only.
Check to see if the tag can have both start and end tags with content in between.

docblock.description: @return boolean True if content allowed. @access public

description.compact: The current tag should not swallow all content for itself as it's searchable page content. Private content tags are usually widgets that contain default values.
Appends string content to the current content.

description.compact: Adds an enclosed tag to the content.

description.compact: Accessor for content reduced to visible text. Acts like a text mode browser, normalising space and reducing images to their alt text.

description.compact: Test to see if id attribute matches.
